00016   lcio::LCCollection *HistogramCollection_t::createHistograms(const std::string &collection_name, 
00017                                                               const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, UInt_t n_hist, 
00018                                                               const HistPar &par) 
00019     throw (std::bad_alloc, std::runtime_error)
00020   {
00021     deleteCollection();
00022 
00023     if (collection_name.empty()) {
00024       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The collection name must not be empty.");
00025     }
00026     
00027     assert ( name_list.empty() || name_list.size()==n_hist );
00028     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=name_list.begin();
00029          name_iter!=name_list.end();
00030          name_iter++) {
00031       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00032     }
00033     
00034     if (par.xMax()<=par.xMin() || par.nBins()==0) {
00035       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00036     }
00037     
00038     //  std::string full_histogram_name=group;
00039     //  full_histogram_name+="::";
00040     //  full_histogram_name+=collection_name;
00041     
00042     delete _histogramCol;
00043     delete _majorIndex;
00044     _majorIndex=0;
00045 
00046     _histogramCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00047     //DEBUG    stat_add(_histogramCol);
00048 
00049     if (name_list.empty()) {
00050       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00051       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00052       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(HistogramCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,temp);
00053     }
00054     else {
00055       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(HistogramCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&name_list)));
00056     }
00057     
00058     for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_hist; hist_i++) {
00059       FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=new FloatHistogram1D(hist_i,par);
00060       _histogramCol->addElement(a_hist);
00061     }
00062 
00063     return _histogramCol;
00064   }
00065 
00066   lcio::LCCollection *HistogramCollection_t::createHistograms(const std::string &collection_name, 
00067                                                               const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, const lcio::IntVec &n_hist_list, 
00068                                                               const HistPar &par) 
00069     throw (std::bad_alloc,std::runtime_error)
00070   {
00071     
00072     if (collection_name.empty()) {
00073       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The histogram name must not be empty.");
00074     }
00075     
00076     assert ( !n_hist_list.empty() );
00077     assert ( name_list.empty()  || name_list.size()==n_hist_list.size() );
00078     
00079     for (EVENT::StringVec::const_iterator name_iter=name_list.begin();
00080          name_iter!=name_list.end();
00081          name_iter++) {
00082       assert ( !name_iter->empty() );
00083     }
00084     
00085     if (par.xMax()<=par.xMin() || par.nBins()==0) {
00086       throw std::runtime_error("HistMgr::createHistograms> The number of bins is zero or the range is empty.");
00087     }
00088     
00089     //    std::string full_histogram_name=group;
00090     //    full_histogram_name+="::";
00091     //    full_histogram_name+=collection_name;
00092 
00093     delete _histogramCol;
00094     delete _majorIndex;
00095 
00096     _histogramCol=new lcio::LCCollectionVec( lcio::LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00097     //DEBUG    stat_add(_histogramCol);
00098 
00099     if (name_list.empty()) {
00100       EVENT::StringVec temp;
00101       temp.push_back(collection_name);
00102       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(HistogramCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,temp);
00103     }
00104     else {
00105       _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(HistogramCollection_t::__histogramNameParameterName,*(const_cast<EVENT::StringVec*>(&name_list)));
00106     }
00107     
00108     UInt_t n_hist=0;
00109     lcio::IntVec *index=new lcio::IntVec;
00110     index->resize(n_hist_list.size()+1);
00111     for (UInt_t index_i=0; index_i<n_hist_list.size(); index_i++) {
00112       (*index)[index_i]=n_hist;
00113       n_hist+=n_hist_list[index_i];
00114     }
00115     (*index)[n_hist_list.size()]=n_hist;
00116 
00117     _histogramCol->parameters().setValues(HistogramCollection_t::__majorIndexParameterName,*index);
00118     _majorIndex=index;
00119     
00120     for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_hist; hist_i++) {
00121       FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=new FloatHistogram1D(hist_i,par);
00122       _histogramCol->addElement(a_hist);
00123     }
00124     return _histogramCol;
00125   }
